title: Battle for Warner Bros heats up as Paramount's best and final offer submitted
description: A takeover would be one of the biggest media deals in history, with significant impacts on TV, filmmaking and possibly the future of the cinema.
content:
Paramount Skydance has offered even more money for Warner Bros Discovery (WBD), adding pressure on the media giant to accept a bid it has so far rejected.

title: Democrats to investigate whether DoJ withheld Epstein files on Trump abuse claim
description: Lawmaker says DoJ appears to have withheld interviews with survivor who accused Trump of ‘heinous crimes’
content: Democrats on the House oversight and government reform committee announced on Tuesday the launch of an investigation to determine whether the US Department of Justice (DoJ) purposely withheld materials that pertain to allegations against Donald Trump... [3435 chars]

title: Kordofan drone strikes: Sudan's pivotal new front line as truce remains elusive
description: Intensified attacks in the Kordofan region have led to mass casualties as peace remains elusive.
content:
Intensified drone attacks on the new front line of Sudan's civil war have led to mass civilian casualties in recent weeks and are increasingly shaping the course of the conflict.
The epicentre of fighting has shifted to the south-central Kordofan reg... [5680 chars]

title: Newcastle finish off Qarabag in rapid time to set up Chelsea or Barcelona tie
description: Newcastle snuffed out any hopes of a miracle Qarabag comeback with two goals in the first six minutes of the second leg to set up a 3-2 win that sealed a place in the Champions League last 16 by a 9-3 aggregate score
content:
Eddie Howe adores motivational slogans and the Newcastle manager’s current favourite is: “One Brain.” The idea is to inspire his team to play with the sort of synchronicity that stems from a collective mindset and unity of purpose.

title: What is the UK's new travel system and how are dual nationals affected?
description: From 25 February, a new system will come into force which will affect many people, including British dual nationals.
content:
A new travel system for visitors to the UK comes into force from Wednesday for citizens of dozens of countries like the US and Australia.
The government says electronic travel authorisation (ETA) will improve the immigration system.
